definition_en: The name of the Latin script letter A/a.
example: I have a car. / 私には自動車があります。

definition_en: Moving around; astir.
meanings_ja: ~のこと、~について (when referring to a topic or subject)
example: The book is about a man who travels around the world. / その本は世界を旅行する男の話です。

definition_en: (usually used predicatively, not attributively, be afraid) Impressed with fear or apprehension; in fear.
meanings_ja: 恐れる (強い畏怖を示す)
example: I'm afraid of heights. / 標高は確実に恐れる。

definition_en: Later; second (of two); next, following, subsequent
example: I'll see you after the meeting. / ミーティングが終わった後、会う

definition_en: Another time; once more.
example: I'll try again tomorrow. / きょうはまたやります。

definition_en: The whole duration of a being, whether animal, plant, or other kind, being alive.
meanings_ja: 時代、年代 (in a historical or cultural context)
example: I'm worried about my age. / 私は自分の年齢に心配している。

definition_en: The speaker or writer, referred to as the grammatical subject, of a sentence.
example: "Ah, I've got a headache!" / "あー、頭痛してるの!"
John's friend Alex is very clever. / ジョンの友人アレックスは非常に賢い。

definition_en: (with a possessive pronoun) Everything that one is capable of.
meanings_ja: すべて (subtly implies everything, as opposed to just some)
全部, 全員, 全て (emphasizes completeness or totality)
example: I want to read all the books on this shelf. / 私はこの棚の全ての本を読みたいです。

definition_en: Before noon.
example: I am a teacher. / 私は教師です。

definition_en: One
example: I need an apple. / 私は一つのアップルが必要です。

definition_en: In rhythm, the second half of a divided beat.
example: I like reading books, and watching movies. / 私は本を読み、映画を見に行く。

definition_en: An additional one of the same kind.
example: Do you want to go to the movies again? / もう映画に行くのか？

definition_en: A response or reply; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question.
example: What's the answer to life, the universe, and everything? / 何は人生、宇宙、あらゆるものの回答ですか?

definition_en: To even the slightest extent, at all.
example: I'll eat any food you give me. / 私はあなたがくれた食べ物を食べます。

definition_en: Any one out of an indefinite number of persons; anyone; any person.
example: Will anybody help me? / 誰かが助けてくれない？

definition_en: Someone or something of importance.
meanings_ja: 何かもしれない、ありえる
example: I'll take anything for dinner. / ディナーは何でもいいです。

definition_en: A complete domicile occupying only part of a building, especially one for rent; a flat.
example: I'm moving into a new apartment next month. / 新しいアパートに引っ越す。

definition_en: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.
example: "The company are looking for new employees." / "会社は新しい社員を募集しています。"

definition_en: To such an extent or degree; to the same extent or degree.
example: I'm going to the party as well / 私もパーティーに行きます

definition_en: An act or instance of asking.
example: Can I ask you a question? / 私はあなたに質問を頼みます。

definition_en: To reply to or talk to someone, either online or face-to-face. (from the practice of targeting a message or reply to someone online by writing @name)
example: I'll meet you at 5 o'clock. / 5時の所で会います。

definition_en: To depart; to go to another place.
example: I'm going away on vacation. / 私は休暇に出かけます。

definition_en: A very young human, particularly from birth to a couple of years old or until walking is fully mastered.
example: The baby is sleeping. / ベビーは寝ています。

definition_en: The rear of the body, especially the part between the neck and the end of the spine and opposite the chest and belly.
meanings_ja: 回復 (身体的・精神的に)
example: I need to take a break and rest my back. / 私は休息して背中を治療したいです。

definition_en: A flexible container made of cloth, paper, plastic, etc.
meanings_ja: 手袋、荷物袋 (these are additional meanings that are less common)
example: I forgot my bags at the airport. / 空港でバッグを忘れました。

definition_en: A solid or hollow sphere, or roughly spherical mass.
meanings_ja: ボールゲームのボール (in sports)
example: The ball flew over the fence. / フェンスの上を球が飛びました。

definition_en: A sport in which two opposing teams of five players strive to put a ball through a hoop.
meanings_ja: アメリカンフットボールのようなスポーツ
example: I love playing basketball with my friends. / 僕たちは友達とバスケットボールを楽しむ。

definition_en: A tub or pool which is used for bathing: bathtub.
example: I'm going to take a bath after dinner. / 晩メールにバスを浴びます。
I will be a doctor. /私は医師になる。

definition_en: For the reason (that).
example: I went to the store because I needed milk. / 私は牛乳が必要だったため、店に行きました。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
meanings_ja: 過去に存在した, 現在の状態が続いている
example: I have been studying Japanese for three years. / 私は3年間日本語を学んでいます。

definition_en: An alcoholic drink fermented from starch material, commonly barley malt, often with hops or some other substance to impart a bitter flavor.
example: I love drinking beer on weekends. / 週末はブルー酒を飲むことが好きです。

definition_en: At an earlier time.
example: I'll see you before the concert starts. / コンサートの始まる前には会う.plan

definition_en: To accept as true, particularly without absolute certainty (i.e., as opposed to knowing)
example: I believe in you. / 君を信じてる。

definition_en: The supreme effort one can make, or has made.
example: This is the best pizza I've ever had. / これは私生まれた最高のピザです。

definition_en: An entity, usually animate, deemed superior to another; one who has a claim to precedence; a superior.
example: This new phone is better than my old one. / 新しい電話は古い私のものより良い

definition_en: Someone or something that is large in stature
example: The big red car is very impressive. / 大きい赤い車はとても印象的です。

definition_en: Physical frame.
example: The human body is made up of many different systems. / 人間の肉体は多くの異なるシステムで構成されている。

definition_en: Each of the two, or of the two kinds.
example: I like both coffee and tea. / 私はコーヒーとティーの両方を好きです。

definition_en: A young male.
example: The boy is playing outside. / 少年は外で遊んでいる。

definition_en: A male partner in an unmarried romantic relationship.
example: My boyfriend is going to be late. / マイパートナールは遅れると思います。

definition_en: A young male.
example: The boys were playing soccer in the park. / park でサッカーをしていた小さな男の子

definition_en: A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
example: The company is in the business of manufacturing cars. / その会社は自動車を製造する商売です。

definition_en: An instance or example of using the word "but".
example: I wanted to go, but it was raining. / 私は行きたいと思ったが、雨だった。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: I'll finish this project by Friday. / 金曜日にはこのプロジェクトを完成します。

definition_en: A telephone conversation.
meanings_ja: 招集する、出席を要請する
example: Can I take this call? / これを受けることができますか?

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
example: I can speak some Japanese. / 私は少し日本語を話すことができます。

definition_en: Something that cannot be done.
example: I cannot speak Japanese fluently. / 私は日本語を流暢に話すことができません。

definition_en: A playing card.
meanings_ja: 証明書 (金融や社会保障などで使用されるカードのこと)
example: I drew a card from the deck. / ボードからプルカードを引きました。

definition_en: A playing card.
meanings_ja: 記憶ゲームのカード (referring to memory games like Concentration)
example: I collect rare cards. / 私は珍しいカードを集めます。

definition_en: Grief, sorrow.
meanings_ja: 謝意、心配 (in a broader sense)
example: I need to take care of my sick grandmother. / 私の病気の祖母を看護する必要があります。

definition_en: An actual event, situation, or fact.
example: This is a special case. / これは特別な関係です。

definition_en: An opportunity or possibility.
example: I got a chance to meet my idol at the concert. / コンサートで、目指すスターと出会うチャンスを掴みました。

definition_en: A group, collection, category or set sharing characteristics or attributes.
example: I'm in class today. / 私は今日教室にいます。

definition_en: Removal of dirt.
example: I will clean my room. / 私は部屋を掃除します。

definition_en: An instrument used to measure or keep track of time; a non-portable timepiece.
example: What time is it? / なんて時間ですか？

definition_en: An end or conclusion.
example: I need to close this deal by Friday. / その取引は金曜日に締結する必要があります。

definition_en: An outer garment covering the upper torso and arms.Wp
meanings_ja: layer of fur or hair on an animal
example: She put on her new coat before going out. / 彼女は外に出る前、新しいコートを着た。

definition_en: Coming, arrival; approach.
example: "I will come to see you tomorrow." / "私たちは明日君に会いに来ます。"

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
meanings_ja: 発見される, 到着する
example: The new employee comes on Monday. / 新しい従業員は月曜日に来る。

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
meanings_ja: 来る (in the sense of "coming soon")
example: The movie is coming out next week. / 映画は来週公開されます。

definition_en: A team; a group of people who work together professionally.
example: The company is going to launch a new product next quarter. / その会社は来年の四半期に新製品を発売する。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
meanings_ja: 過去に可能であった (past possibility)
すべき能力がある (ability to do something)
example: I could go to Tokyo if I had more time. / 東京に行くことができるのは時間があればできると思う。

definition_en: A sequence of events.
example: Take this course to learn more about marketing strategies. / マーケティング戦略について学ぶためにこのコースを取ります。

definition_en: To bring into existence; (sometimes in particular:)
meanings_ja: 生み出す (in a more figurative sense)
example: The artist creates a beautiful painting. / アーティストは美しい絵を描く。

definition_en: A concave vessel for drinking from, usually made of opaque material (as opposed to a glass) and with a handle.
meanings_ja: 杯子 (cupful), 飲み物の容器
example: I'll need a few cups of coffee. / コーヒーを数杯必要します。

definition_en: The act of cutting.
example: I need to cut this rope. / これらのロープを切断する必要があります。

definition_en: Possessing physical features, behaviors, personality traits or other properties that are mainly attributed to infants and small or cuddly animals; e.g. fair, dainty, round, and soft physical features, disproportionately large eyes and head, playfulness, fragility, helplessness, curiosity or shyness, innocence, affectionate behavior.
meanings_ja: 可憐 (kayoi) - This translates to "adorable" or "lovely".
かわいい (kawaii) - This is a more informal translation that means "cute", "sweet", or "endearing".
example: The puppy is cute! / ちび犬は可愛らしい！

definition_en: A father, a male parent.
example: My dad is a great cook. / 私のお父さんは優秀な料理人です。

definition_en: (usually childish) Father.
example: My daddy always takes me to the park on Sundays. / 私の父親は毎週日曜日に私を公園に連れていく。

definition_en: To resolve (a contest, problem, dispute, etc.); to choose, determine, or settle
example: I need to decide what movie to see tonight. / 今夜の映画を見に行くことを決断する必要がある。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: I did my homework yesterday. /昨日は宿題を実行しました。
I didn't finish my homework. / 私は宿題を終わらせませんでした。

definition_en: To stop living; to become dead; to undergo death.
meanings_ja: 停止する (in a non-literal sense, e.g. a dying ember)
example: The fire is going to die if we don't add more fuel. / 火は燃えないから、もっと燃料を加えないと死ぬ。

definition_en: A party, celebration, social function.
meanings_ja: 做る (performing a task or action)
example: I will do my homework tonight. / 今夜は宿題をやる。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: She does yoga every morning. / 彼女は毎朝ヨガをしている。
"She doesn't want to go" / "彼女は行くことを嫌う"

definition_en: A mammal, Canis familiaris or Canis lupus familiaris, that has been domesticated for thousands of years, of highly variable appearance due to human breeding.
example: The little boy loved his pet dog. / 男の子はペットのドッグが大好きです。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: What's she doing tonight? / 今夜は何をしているの？

definition_en: A toy in the form of a human.
example: The child hugged her favorite doll. / 子供は自分の好きな人形を抱きした。

definition_en: A university professor, particularly one at Oxford or Cambridge.
example: He don a hat to protect himself from the sun. / 彼は帽子を被って太陽から身を守る。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: I've finished my homework. / 私の家庭課は完了です。

definition_en: A portal of entry into a building, room, or vehicle, consisting of a rigid plane movable on a hinge. Doors are frequently made of wood or metal. May have a handle to help open and close, a latch to hold the door closed and a lock that ensures the door cannot be opened without the key.
example: I opened the door and walked into the room. / 私はドアを開けて部屋に入った。

definition_en: A negative aspect; a downer.
meanings_ja: 下の所、下部 (e.g. down payment, down town)
example: I'm going down to the store. / 私は店に下ります。

definition_en: The result of a contest that neither side has won; a tie.
meanings_ja: 引き出す（物を）, 取り出す
example: I like to draw animals when I'm bored. / 私は退屈した時に動物を描くのが好きです。

definition_en: The name of the Latin-script letter E.
meanings_ja: 電子 (as in electronic device or e-book)
example: I'm going to buy an e-book on Amazon. / アマゾンで電子書籍を購入します。

definition_en: (operations) An individual item: the least quantitative unit in a grouping.
example: I will give each student a book. / 私は各生徒に1冊の本をあげます。

definition_en: The organ of hearing, consisting of the pinna, auditory canal, eardrum, malleus, incus, stapes and cochlea.
example: I have an ear infection. / 私は耳inniekiがある。

definition_en: The terminal point of something in space or time.
Sufficiently.
meanings_ja: 需要以上の, 必要以上の
example: I've got enough money to buy this gift. / わたしにはこれを買うのに十分な金がある。

meanings_ja: 毎回、毎度 (for every occasion or situation)
example: I go to the gym every day. / 私は毎日スポーツセンターに行きます。

definition_en: All people.
example: Everybody loves pizza. / すべての人、ピザが好きです。

definition_en: All the things under discussion.
example: I've learned everything I need to know. / 私は知識を一切必要としなくなった。

definition_en: In or to all locations under discussion.
example: I can find my phone everywhere. / 私の電話はどこでも見つけることができます。

definition_en: To stir the emotions of.
example: The roller coaster was exciting! / ローラーコースターは 極めて楽しかった!

definition_en: To make plain, manifest, or intelligible; to clear of obscurity; to illustrate the meaning of.
example: Can you explain this complex concept to me? / あなたは、この複雑な概念を私に説明してくれませんか?

definition_en: Something actual as opposed to invented.
example: The new study revealed a surprising fact about climate change. / 気候変動に関する驚くべき事実を明かした新しい研究。

definition_en: Something which is fair (in various senses of the adjective).
example: The fair weather was perfect for our picnic. / ピクニックには良い天気でした。

definition_en: Distant; remote in space.
meanings_ja: 多分、距離的に離れた場所にある
example: The hotel is far from the city center. / ホテルは市中心部から遠い所にあります。

definition_en: A person or thing who enjoys special regard or favour.
meanings_ja: 好きになる傾向にある
example: My favorite book is "To Kill a Mockingbird" / 私の大好きな本は「Mockingbird」です

definition_en: A quality of an object experienced by touch.
meanings_ja: 感じる (to perceive or sense something)
好きにする (to develop an affection for something)
example: I feel happy when I'm with my friends. / 私は友達と一緒にいて幸福感を感じます。

definition_en: A biological structure found in many animals that is used for locomotion and that is frequently a separate organ at the terminal part of the leg.
example: I'm tired from walking for hours on my feet. / 私は、幾時間も足で歩いて疲れた。

definition_en: A land area free of woodland, cities, and towns; open country.
meanings_ja: 分野, 分野（学問、スポーツなど）
example: The company is looking for new talent in the field of data science. / データサイエンスの分野で新たなタレントを探しています。

definition_en: To contend in physical conflict, either singly or in war, battle etc.
example: The two countries will fight over the resources. / その国々は資源を巡って対立する。

definition_en: Anything that is found (usually valuable), as objects on an archeological site or a person with talent.
meanings_ja: 発見する (to discover), 挨拶する (to get to know)
example: I found a great restaurant last night. / 夜中にすばらしいレストランを見つけた。

definition_en: Fine champagne; French brandy.
example: The new smartphone is fine. / 新しいスマートフォンは高く品質が良い。

definition_en: An end; the end of anything.
meanings_ja: 完成する, 完了する
example: I will finish my homework tonight. / 私は今晩の仕事を終える。

definition_en: The person or thing in the first position.
meanings_ja: 一番の, 最初の (for emphasizing that something is the most important or earliest)
example: The first step to success is to set clear goals. / 成功のはじめのステップは明確な目標を設定することです。

definition_en: A cold-blooded vertebrate animal that lives in water, moving with the help of fins and breathing with gills.
meanings_ja: (sports) - this refers to the act of catching or attempting to catch a fish, often in the context of fishing as a sport.
example: I went fishing to catch some fish. / 私は魚を捕るために釣り去了。

definition_en: The digit/figure 5.
example: I have five children. / 私は五人の子供があります。

definition_en: The interior bottom or surface of a house or building; the supporting surface of a room.
example: The company has three floors in its new office building. / その会社の新しいオフィスビルには3階層あります。

definition_en: A colorful, conspicuous structure associated with angiosperms, frequently scented and attracting various insects, and which may or may not be used for sexual reproduction.
example: The flowers in the garden were beautiful. / 園内の花は美しいです。

definition_en: Any solid substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
example: I love trying new food at festivals. / ワンダフル フェスティバルの新しい食物を試すのが大好きです。
I'm studying for my exam. / 私は試験のため勉強しています。

definition_en: To lose remembrance of.
example: I forgot my phone charger. / 私の電話充電器を忘れました。

definition_en: The digit or figure 4; an occurrence thereof.
meanings_ja: 4つのグループに分類されたもの - categorized into four groups
example: I have four dogs. / 私は四匹の犬を持っています。

definition_en: Free transfer
meanings_ja: 無料 (as in "a free gift") / nothing
example: The company is offering a free trial period for new customers. / 会社は新規顧客に無料試用期間を提供しています。

definition_en: A person other than a family member, spouse or lover whose company one enjoys and towards whom one feels affection.
meanings_ja: 友人 (a more formal or polite way to refer to someone who is not necessarily close, but still considered as a good acquaintance)
交際 (referring to social contacts or acquaintances)
example: My friend and I will go to the park. / 私と友達は公園に行きます。

definition_en: Used to indicate source or provenance.
example: I'm from Tokyo. / 私は東京出身。

definition_en: Amusement, enjoyment or pleasure
example: I had fun at the party yesterday. / 私は昨日パーティーで楽しみました。

definition_en: A joke.
example: The comedian's jokes were funny. / comediansのジョークは面白かった。

definition_en: A playful or competitive activity.
meanings_ja: コンピューターゲーム、スポーツ (for computer games and sports)
example: The new game is really fun. / 新しい遊びはとても楽しい。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To move, shift, provide something abstract or concrete to someone or something or somewhere.
meanings_ja: 提供する, 支給する
example: I gave her a gift. / 彼女に贈り物を与えた。

definition_en: Offspring.
meanings_ja: 取得する, 到着する
example: I will get my ticket at the station. / 駅でチケットを手に入れます。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To obtain; to acquire.
example: I'm getting tired. / 私は疲れている。

definition_en: A female child, adolescent, or a young woman.
example: She's a sweet girl. / 彼女はかわいい女の子です。

definition_en: A female child, adolescent, or a young woman.
meanings_ja: 乙女 (in a more poetic or romantic sense)
example: The girls loved playing soccer in the park. / parkでサッカーをプレーする女子がいた。

definition_en: The amount of bending that something undergoes when a force is applied to it; a tendency to yield under pressure; resilence.
example: I will give you my phone number. / ボクの電話番号をあなたに提供します。

definition_en: The act of going.
example: I will go to the store. / 私は店に行く。

definition_en: A being such as a monotheistic God: a single divine creator and ruler of the universe.
example: God is great. / 神は偉大です。

definition_en: The act of going.
meanings_ja: Proceeding, Continuing (in a process or state)
example: The train goes to Tokyo. / 東京に向かう列車はあります。

definition_en: To move:
example: I'm going to the store. / 私は店にいる。

definition_en: (of people)
meanings_ja: 善い、良好 (in a general sense)
example: The food is good. / その料理は権しいです。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To obtain; to acquire.
example: I got lost on my way home. / 家路で迷子になった。

definition_en: A person of major significance, accomplishment or acclaim.
example: She's a great singer. / 彼女はとても良好な歌手です。

definition_en: Having green as its color.
example: The green forest was perfect for a picnic. / 森林はピクニックに適した場所です。

definition_en: To become larger, to increase in magnitude.
example: The company wants to grow its customer base. / 社長は顧客を増やすことを目指す。

definition_en: A recipient of hospitality, specifically someone staying by invitation at the house of another.
example: The hotel has a lot of guests during peak season. / ホテルはピークシーズンには多くの招待客がいる。

definition_en: An effigy of a man burned on a bonfire on the anniversary of the Gunpowder Plot (5th November).
example: What's that guy doing? / その男は何してるの？

definition_en: An effigy of a man burned on a bonfire on the anniversary of the Gunpowder Plot (5th November).
meanings_ja: 仲間、友人 (informal group of people)
example: What's up, guys? / 「何してるの、男たち？」

definition_en: (chiefly Internet slang) Used as a filler response when one does not have a response to use. Almost always used by itself.
example: The sound of the waves was calming. / 波の音は和らかにした。

definition_en: To possess, own.
example: I had a car. / 私は車を持っていた。

definition_en: A pigmented filament of keratin which grows from a follicle on the skin of humans and other mammals.
example: The girl brushed her hair. / 少女は haar を払った。

definition_en: One of two usually roughly equal parts into which anything may be divided, or considered as divided.
example: I'm half asleep. / 私は眠りきれない状態です。

definition_en: To occur or take place.

As a dictionary, I'll provide the main meanings of the English word "y" with their Japanese translations.

**Word:** y

**Meaning 1:** (ai) - はい ("yes")

This is the most common meaning of "y", which can be translated to "yes" in Japanese.

**Meaning 2:** (yo) - やり ("to do")

In this sense, "y" is used as an adverb or preposition to indicate doing something. For example: "Can you y that for me?" -> "あなたはそれは私にやりますか?"

**Example Sentence:** English: Are you coming to the party tonight? / Japanese: つきのパーティーに行くのか?

Note: The word "y" is an extremely versatile and context-dependent word, so this is just a brief summary of its main meanings.

definition_en: Expressing joy, celebration, glee, etc.
example: "Do you want to go?" / "Yeah, I'll go!"

definition_en: A solar year, the time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).

I'd be happy to help you with that!

English word: year

Meanings:

1: 年 (nendo) - This is the most common meaning of "year", referring to a period of 12 months.
2: ~の年の (yonen no) - This phrase can be used to indicate a specific year, e.g. "2000年代" (ni-sen kyūhyaku nendai) meaning "the 2000s".
Example: It's been five years since I graduated from college. / 高校卒業から5年経過しています。

Note: The example sentence is just one possible translation, and there are many other ways to express the same idea in Japanese.

meanings_ja: 慣れ親しむ (for more casual or informal situations)
example: I've always been familiar with this song. / 私はこの歌をいつも知っている。

definition_en: To calculate, to solve a mathematical problem.
example: I figured out how to fix the problem. / 私は問題の解決方法を推測してしまった。

definition_en: The pungent aromatic rhizome of a tropical Asian herb, Zingiber officinale, used as a spice and as a stimulant and acarminative.
meanings_ja: オレンジの 향미を持つ食材
example: The chef added some ginger to the stir-fry. / チーフはステアフライに人参を加えた。

definition_en: A hard gelatin made by boiling bones and hides, used in solution as an adhesive; or any sticky adhesive substance.
example: I need glue to fix this broken toy. / これらの壊れた玩具を修理するには、接着剤が必要です。

definition_en: (minced oath) A mild expression of surprise or enthusiasm.
example: "Gosh, that's amazing!" / "びっくり、すごい!"

definition_en: The rear part of the foot, where it joins the leg.
meanings_ja: (スキー・スノーボードなどの)足元の部分
example: I sprained my ankle at the heel. / 足首を捻傷してしまった。

meanings_ja: 悪魔の領域 (in religious or mythological contexts)
example: The soldiers were sent to hell in World War II. / 第二次世界大戦では兵士たちは地獄に送られた。

definition_en: One which receives or entertains a guest, socially, commercially, or officially.
example: The company will host a conference next week. / その会社は来週、会議を開催します。

definition_en: To shed light upon.
example: The book is illustrated with beautiful pictures. / その書物は美しい絵で装飾されています。

definition_en: Imagination; fancy.
example: The imaginary friend is a popular concept in children's stories. / 子供物語での想像の友達は有名な概念です。

definition_en: The quality or condition of being important or worthy of note.
example: The importance of education cannot be overstated. / 教育の重要性は過不足ない。

definition_en: An Okinawan martial art involving primarily punching and kicking, but additionally, advanced throws, arm bars, grappling and all means of fighting.
example: I've been practicing karate since childhood. / 私は子供の頃から空手を習い続けてきた。

definition_en: A vessel for boiling a liquid or cooking food, usually metal and equipped with a lid.
example: I need to boil some water for tea. / その水をお茶にとるために電子レンジを使う必要があります。

definition_en: To strike or hit with the foot or other extremity of the leg.
example: The soccer player was kicking the ball. / サッカー選手はボールを蹴っていた。

definition_en: A flash of light produced by short-duration, high-voltage discharge of electricity within a cloud, between clouds, or between a cloud and the earth.
meanings_ja: 気象災害 (in this sense, lightning refers to a severe weather phenomenon)
example: The storm brought forth a bolt of lightning. / 嵐は電光を降りた。

definition_en: Lines
example: I launched a new ll into space. / 我々は新しいロケットを打ち上げた。

definition_en: To cause (something) to cease to be in one's possession or capability due to unfortunate or unknown circumstances, events or reasons.
example: I'm losing my train of thought. / 私の考えが滅ぶ

definition_en: An object used to mark a location.
meanings_ja: マーカー (a symbol or sign indicating something)
記号 (a mark or symbol used to indicate a specific point)
example: The teacher used a marker to highlight important points in the textbook. / 教師は教科書の重要な部分をマーカーで強調した。

definition_en: An object used to mark a location.
meanings_ja: マーカー (ペンやインクなど)
example: The company uses markers to label their products. / 会社は商品をマーカーでラベル化しています。

definition_en: A prescribed quantity or extent.
example: The company took measures to improve its customer service. / その会社は顧客サービスを改善するために様々な方法を講じた。

definition_en: A familiar, invented given name for a person or thing used instead of the actual name of the person or thing.
example: Her nickname is "Sunshine" / 彼女の愛称は「サンシャイン」

definition_en: Easily discovered, seen, or understood; self-explanatory.
example: The solution to the problem was obvious. / 問題の解決は明白なだった。

definition_en: To propose or express one's willingness (to do something).
example: The company made an offering of new stocks. / 会社は新株の提供を行った。

definition_en: A proposal that has been made.
meanings_ja: 質問、提案 (in a business or academic context)
example: The company is making offers to potential investors. / 企業は投資家に提供しています。

definition_en: Other than supposed; different.
meanings_ja: 一旦決断した場合は (if one has already decided)
example: If I don't get the job, I'll otherwise look for another opportunity. / もう一つの機会を探すことになる

definition_en: A flattened mass of anything soft, to sit or lie on.
meanings_ja: テープや紙などの盤状の材料
便所や洗面所に設置された座席
example: I need a pad to write on. / 私は筆を書くためにテープが必要です。

definition_en: Urine.
meanings_ja: 小便（子供が尿を出すことを指す）
example: The dog likes to pee on the fire hydrant. / 犬は水栓に尿を出すのを好きです。

definition_en: To put (an object or person) in a specific location.
example: The company is placing a high value on employee satisfaction. / 企業は従業員の満足に高く評価しています。

definition_en: A positive quantity.
example: I'll add 5 plus 3 is 8. / 私は5を加算し、3を足すと8ですね。

definition_en: A metal rod, generally of wrought iron, for adjusting the burning logs or coals in a fire; a firestick.
meanings_ja: 適切な言葉をいうこと
example: "I'm going to play poker with friends tonight." / 「私たちは今夜友達とカードゲームをしよう。」

definition_en: Originally, a stick; now specifically, a long and slender piece of metal or (especially) wood, used for various construction or support purposes.
meanings_ja: 枚 (astronomical pole), 枝 (poles in a tent)
example: The North Pole is very cold. / 北極は非常に寒い。

definition_en: To make ready for a specific future purpose; to set up; to assemble or equip.
example: The chef was prepared to cook a special meal. /シェフは特別な料理を調理するために準備していた。

definition_en: A declaration of belief, faith or one's opinion, whether genuine or pretended.
example: As a doctor, medicine is my profession. / 医師として、医療は私の職業です。

definition_en: With little or no sound; free of disturbing noise.
example: The noise level in the office was quieter after the meeting. / オフィス内でのノイズレベルはミーティング後quiet。

definition_en: (physical) To cause to rise; to lift or elevate.
example: I raised my hand to ask a question. / 私は質問するために手を上げました。

definition_en: Collectively, items or material that have been discarded; rubbish, garbage.
example: I refuse to do that task. / 私はそのタスクをdeclinenします。

definition_en: A response.
example: What's your response to my proposal? / わたしの提案に対するあなたの答えは何ですか？

definition_en: An answer or reply, or something in the nature of an answer or reply.
example: What is your response to this offer? / これらのオファーの答えは何ですか？
The actor is known as Ross in Hollywood. / ハリウッドで俳優はロスとして知られています。

definition_en: Pliable material derived from the sap of the rubber tree; a hydrocarbon polymer of isoprene.
example: I got a new rubber ball for my birthday. /誕生日には新しい弾性ボールを手に入れた。

definition_en: A hall.
example: The company's sales of new products have been impressive. / 新製品の売り上げは印象的です。

definition_en: A man whose job it is to sell things, either in a shop/store or elsewhere.
example: The salesman was very persuasive. / 取引員はとても説得力があった。

definition_en: One of several species of fish, typically of the Salmoninae subfamily, brownish above with silvery sides and delicate pinkish-orange flesh; they ascend rivers to spawn.
meanings_ja: 資金魚 (referring to salmon as a food fish)
example: The chef grilled the salmon and served it with a side of rice. / チーフはタコノキモをグリルして、ライスと共に提供した。

definition_en: To cry out with a shrill voice; to utter a sudden, sharp outcry, or shrill, loud cry, as in fright or extreme pain; to shriek; to screech.
example: The concert was so loud that it started screaming. / コンサートはとてもloudでしたため、叫び始めた。

definition_en: The condition of not being threatened, especially physically, psychologically, emotionally, or financially.
example: The company prioritizes customer security. / その会社は顧客の安全性を優先します。

definition_en: The part of a garment that covers the arm.
example: I need to take off my sleeve to wash the shirt. / 私はシャツの襟を取り下げて洗う必要があります。

definition_en: A general type.
example: I need to sort these papers by priority. / 優先順位でこれらの書類を分類する。

definition_en: To take illegally, or without the owner's permission, something owned by someone else.
meanings_ja: つくった (as in stole a glance)
example: She stole a kiss from her lover. / 彼女は恋人からキスを盗んだ。

definition_en: To become or remain attached; to adhere.
example: I'm stuck in traffic. / 私は渋滞にストックされています。

definition_en: To take for granted; to conclude, with less than absolute supporting data; to believe.
example: I was supposed to go to the party, but I got sick. / 私はパーティーに行くはずだったが、病気になった。

definition_en: Arousing suspicion.
example: The police were suspicious of the stranger who was lurking around the corner. / 警察は、コーナーのあわてていた男に疑いの目を持っていた。

definition_en: (archaic outside of idioms) To count, reckon, or enumerate.
meanings_ja: 印象的な / 表現的 (in a figurative sense)
example: The way she told the story was really telling. / 彼女が話した方法は本当に伝えていました。

definition_en: An amount obtained by the addition of smaller amounts.
meanings_ja: 全額,全体 (depending on the context)
example: The total cost of the project was $100,000. / プロジェクトの総費用は 100,000 ドルでした。

definition_en: To the fullest extent or degree.
meanings_ja: まったく (in an emphatic or absolute sense)
example: I'm totally exhausted after working all night. / 私は夜中働いた後完全に疲れました。

definition_en: Emotionally moved (by), made to feel emotion (by).
meanings_ja: 感動する (また、心が通じる)
example: She was touched by his kind words. / 彼の優しい言葉に彼女は感動した。

definition_en: A person who obtains things by force; a thug or bully.
example: The hiking trail was tough to navigate. / 山道は難を超えた。

definition_en: During the Middle Ages, a series of battles and other contests designed to prepare knights for war.
example: The tennis tournament will be held next month. / テニス選手会は来月開催されます。

definition_en: Buying and selling of goods and services on a market.
meanings_ja: 輸送、交換 (in a broader sense)
example: We're considering entering the trade of exporting high-tech products. / 我々は高テク製品の輸出入貿易に参加することを考えています。

definition_en: Useless things to be discarded; rubbish; refuse.
meanings_ja: ぶんき ( garbage), やもり ( rubbish)
example: The trash can was filled to the brim. / あかんじは満タンにみちた。

definition_en: Something designed to fool or swindle.
example: He pulled off a great trick. /彼はすばらしいからくる行った。

definition_en: Anything that is typical, normal, or standard.
example: This city is typical of many in Europe. / この都市はヨーロッパの多くの都市と同じ一般的です。

definition_en: An expression used to show contentment for something
example: "I'm not sure... um, let me think about it." / "不明确... ちょっと考えてみてください。"

definition_en: Not to be believed.
example: The magician's trick was unbelievable! / マジックのトリックは惰かろうが！

definition_en: Except on a specified condition; if not.
example: I'll go to the party unless you don't want me to. / 私はパーティーに行くよ、そのうちあなたが行きたいと思わない限り。

definition_en: Fate; destiny; luck.
example: The band's weird music was a hit among fans. / バンドの不思議な音楽はファンの人気にした。

definition_en: To conquer, defeat.
example: The winning team celebrated their championship with a parade. / 優勝チームはチャンピオンシップを祝うためにパレードを行った。

definition_en: Anything exceptionally surprising, unbelievable, outstanding, etc.
example: The fireworks display was wow! / 火worksは実に驚くような展示でした!

definition_en: A shout.
example: The kids started to yell when they didn't get what they wanted. / 子供たちは欲しいものがなかったため叫び始めた。

definition_en: Each of the five regions of the earth's surface into which it was divided by climatic differences, namely the torrid zone (between the tropics), two temperate zones (between the tropics and the polar circles), and two frigid zones (within the polar circles).
meanings_ja: 対象地域 (in certain contexts, e.g. security zone)
example: The new shopping mall is in its trial zone, only allowing staff and friends to enter. / 新しいショッピングモールは、試験区画にあり、社員や友人しか入れない。

definition_en: (modal) In act or in fact; really; in truth; positively.
example: I actually like your idea. / 私はあなたのアイデアが実際に好きです。

definition_en: A fully grown human or animal.
example: The museum is geared towards adults. / 美術館は大人のためのものです。

definition_en: In a contrary direction to.
meanings_ja: 反対にする (opposite opinion or decision)
example: The company is against the new tax law / その会社は新税法に反対している

definition_en: Something or someone that doesn't quite make it.
example: I'm almost finished with my project. / 私のプロジェクトはほぼ終わりに近い。

definition_en: To fill with wonder and surprise; to astonish, astound, surprise or perplex.
example: The new roller coaster is amazing! / その新しいローラーコースターは驚くべき！

definition_en: An attempt to cause damage, injury to, or death of opponent or enemy.
meanings_ja: 攻撃 (kōgeki) - to physically or verbally assault someone or something
攻撃 (kōgeki) / 攻略 (golizumu) - a sudden and forceful move or action against an opponent or target
example: The company launched an attack on the market with their new product. / コングリザムは新製品を市場に攻撃して、たちまち人気になった。

definition_en: Causing attraction; having the quality of attracting by inherent force.
example: She's an attractive person. / 彼女は美しい人です。

definition_en: A stroke; a blow.
meanings_ja: その他の意味での勝ち（例えば競争や試合）
example: I'll beat my personal best time if I train harder. / 私はより努力して、自己ベスト記録に達します。

definition_en: To start, to initiate or take the first step into something.
meanings_ja: 始まると共に (other meanings may include "starts", "initiates", etc.)
example: The new project begins today. / 今日から新プロジェクトが始まる。

definition_en: A living creature.
example: What's it like being a celebrity? /  celebritiesはどんな感じだろう?

definition_en: To have its proper place.
example: This book belongs to me. / この本は私物です。

definition_en: A wager, an agreement between two parties that a stake (usually money) will be paid by the loser to the winner (the winner being the one who correctly forecast the outcome of an event).
example: I'm going to bet on the Yankees. / マイナンバースがヤンキースに賭けます。

definition_en: The act of biting.
meanings_ja: 口撃ちにする (a more formal or polite way to say "to bite")
example: The dog likes to bite my shoelaces. / 犬は私のズボンの紐を食いちぐると好む。

definition_en: A heavy, loosely woven fabric, usually large and woollen, used for warmth while sleeping or resting.
example: I wrapped myself in a blanket to keep warm. / 私は被覆物で暖をとりました。

definition_en: A heavy shoe that covers part of the leg.
example: I need new boots for hiking. / Bootsで山登りするために新しい足袋が必要です。

definition_en: An item of underwear worn to support the breasts; now commonly shortened to bra.
meanings_ja: スポーツブラ（ athletic bra, sports bra ）
example: I need to buy a new bra. / 新しいブラウスが必要です。

definition_en: A manner of transporting or lifting something; the grip or position in which something is carried.
example: The package carries a warning label. / パッケージは注意書きを備えている。

definition_en: To become something different.
meanings_ja: 交代する (in a sequential sense)
example: The weather is changing every day. / 天気は日々変化しています。

definition_en: The state of being a child.
example: My childhood was spent playing outside. / 私の少年期は外で遊んでいた。

definition_en: A small piece broken from a larger piece of solid material.
meanings_ja: チップ (パイプや木材の)小切片
example: Can I have some chips with my sandwich? / サンドウィッチに芋チップスをください。

definition_en: To remove dirt from a place or object.
example: I cleaned my room yesterday. / 私は昨日部屋を掃除しました。

definition_en: A brief, sharp, not particularly loud, relatively high-pitched sound produced by the impact of something small and hard against something hard, such as by the operation of a switch, a lock or a latch, or a finger pressed against the thumb and then released to strike the hand.
example: The camera needs to click to take a picture. / カメラは写真を撮るために音を出す必要がある。

definition_en: An association of members joining together for some common purpose, especially sports or recreation.
meanings_ja: クラブ (gathering of people with shared interests)
スポーツクラブ (organization for playing sports)
example: The company has several clubs for employees to participate in, including a soccer club and a book club. / その会社は、社員たちが参加できるクラブがありますね、サッカークラブと文学クラブを含みます。

definition_en: To think about seriously.
example: I will consider your proposal. / 私はあなたの提案を考えます。

definition_en: Free from error; true; accurate.
example: The answer is correct. / 回答は正しい。

definition_en: A man who tends free-range cattle, especially in the American West.
example: The cowboy rode into town on his horse. / 馬鹿野郎は馬に乗って町に向かった。

definition_en: An insane or eccentric person; a crackpot.
meanings_ja: сумアス (in informal contexts or with young people)
example: The rollercoaster was crazy! / そのローラーコースターは狂いしい！

definition_en: A specific act committed in violation of the law.
example: The police investigated a crime scene yesterday. / 警察は昨日、犯罪現場を捜査した。

definition_en: Tending to ask questions, or to want to explore or investigate; inquisitive; (with a negative connotation) nosy, prying.
example: I'm a curious person. / 私は興味を持つ人です。

definition_en: Exposure to likely harm; peril.
example: The new project poses a danger to our company's reputation. / その新プロジェクトは、私たちの会社の名誉に危険をもたらす。

definition_en: Full of danger.
example: The hike was considered dangerous due to the steep terrain. / 山道が陥没していたため、ハイキングは危険と評価されました。

definition_en: A challenge to prove courage.
example: I dared to ask her out. / 私は彼女に誘った。

definition_en: A division, a portion, a share.
example: I made a deal with my friend to meet up tomorrow. / 明日、友達と取り決めたため会う

definition_en: To converse or debate concerning a particular topic.
example: We will discuss the new project proposal. / 私たちは新しいプロジェクトの提案を話し合う。

definition_en: An open-topped box that can be slid in and out of the cabinet that contains it, used for storing clothing or other articles.
meanings_ja: Chest or box for storing things
Part of a piece of furniture with slides that can be opened and closed to store items
example: I need to clean out my dresser. / 私のドレスラーを掃除する必要があります。

definition_en: To provide an impetus for motion or other physical change, to move an object by means of the provision of force thereto.
meanings_ja: 生徒を指導すること (in a educational sense)
example: I love driving on the highway. / 高速道路で車を運転するのを愛します。

definition_en: The process by which something is dried.
meanings_ja: 乾いた (water, etc.) / 退廃した (emotions, etc.)
example: The desert air is very dry. / 砂漠の空気は非常にはつきない。

definition_en: To last, continue, endure.
example: I met her during my trip to Japan. / 私は日本旅行中の彼女と出会った。

definition_en: Comfortably, without discomfort or anxiety.
example: I can learn this skill easily / 私はこのスキルをすぐに学べる

definition_en: (diminutive) An even number.
example: Even I can do that. / 私もそれができる。

definition_en: Occurring at any time, occurring even but once during a timespan.
meanings_ja: いつも, かつては (in a negative sense)
example: I've always loved you. / 私はあなたを常に愛しています。

definition_en: (rare) the ordinary or routine day or occasion
example: I like my everyday life in Japan. / 私は、日本での日常的な生活が好きです。

definition_en: Explanation designed to avoid or alleviate guilt or negative judgment; a plea offered in extenuation of a fault.
example: I need an excuse for being late. / 私の遅刻の理由が必要です。

definition_en: The imagination.
meanings_ja: fancy には、"high-end"や"luxurious"などの意味もあります。
example: I went to a fancy restaurant last night. / 私は昨晩、高級なレストランに伺った。

definition_en: A specialized animal tissue with a high oil content, used for long-term storage of energy.
example: The fat cat was happy to lounge on the couch. / 樽猫はソファーでくつろいでいた。

definition_en: A cloth or stuff made of matted fibres of wool, or wool and fur, fulled or wrought into a compact substance by rolling and pressure, with lees or size, without spinning or weaving.
example: I felt the softness of the fabric. /fabricは手触れがあって柔らかかった。

definition_en: Strength or energy of body or mind; active power; vigour; might; capacity of exercising an influence or producing an effect.
example: The force of the wind was strong. / 風の強さは強くありました。

definition_en: To lose remembrance of.
meanings_ja: 留意しなかった (in a more formal or literary context)
example: I forgot my umbrella at home. / 私の傘を家に置き忘れた。

definition_en: Food waste material of any kind.
example: The city's garbage collection schedule is very efficient. / 市のゴミ回収スケジュールは非常に効率的です。

definition_en: A man of gentle but not noble birth, particularly a man of means (originally ownership of property) who does not work for a living but has no official status in a peerage; an armiferous man ranking below a knight.
example: The gentlemen at the club were very kind to us. / クラブの高尚な男性たちは、私たちに対して非常に優しくした。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To move, shift, provide something abstract or concrete to someone or something or somewhere.
example: I'm giving my friend a gift. / 私は友達に贈り物を与える。

definition_en: Ice hockey, a game on ice in which two teams of six players skate and try to score by shooting a puck into the opposing team's net, using their sticks.
meanings_ja: スポーツ (hockey as a sport)
example: The hockey game was intense. / アイスホッケーの試合は熱烈でした。

definition_en: A coarse mediaeval coat of defence, especially one made of leather.
meanings_ja: クラウン（工具） - a type of tool, typically used for lifting or holding things in place
ジャック (人物) - a person's name or a term for a leader or authority figure
example: I need to use a jack to lift the car. / 車を上げるため、クラウンが必要です。

definition_en: To propel oneself rapidly upward, downward and/or in any horizontal direction such that momentum causes the body to become airborne.
example: The kids were jumping rope in the park. / 子供たちは公園で跳 ropeをしていた。

definition_en: The main tower of a castle or fortress, located within the castle walls.
example: She keeps her promises. / 彼女は約束を守る。

definition_en: A hit or strike with the leg, foot or knee.
meanings_ja: 攻撃する (in sports or martial arts)
example: The boxer's quick kick caught his opponent off guard. / ボクサーはスピードのあるキックで相手に襲撃した。

definition_en: The act of killing.
meanings_ja: 物を壊す (in a figurative sense, e.g. "killing someone's reputation")
example: The soldier had to kill or be killed in battle. / 軍人は戦いで生き延びるか殺されるしかなかった。

definition_en: The sound of laughing, produced by air so expelled; any similar sound.
example: She heard the audience's laughter after her joke. / 彼女のジョークに対する観客の笑いを聞いた。

definition_en: To have a consequence or remnant.
example: I'm leaving tomorrow. / 私は明日退出します。

definition_en: Something that is low; a low point.
meanings_ja: 微小, 淡い (for "low" as in "low-key" or "low-pitched")
example: The sound quality is low. / 音質が低いです。

definition_en: The state of being married.
example: She's getting married next year. / 彼女は来年の結婚式を挙げる。

definition_en: A flat piece of coarse material used for wiping one’s feet, or as a decorative or protective floor covering.
meanings_ja: 床 (futon) - a flat surface used as a bed or resting place
地面 (jimyaku) - a flat area of ground, such as a grass mat or a doormat
example: The yoga studio had a thick mat on the floor. / ヤングスタジオの床には厚いマットがありました。

definition_en: To intend.
example: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings. / 私はあなたの心を傷つけるつもりじゃなかった。

definition_en: The ability of the brain to record information or impressions with the facility of recalling them later at will.
meanings_ja: メモリー (referring to computer memory)
記録 (referring to a recording or documentation)
example: The old house had many memories for me. / 私の心に多くの記憶があった古い家

definition_en: Power, strength, force or influence held by a person or group.
example: The company might go bankrupt if it doesn't receive funding. / その会社は資金が入らなければBankruptcyに陥る可能性があります。

definition_en: To fail to hit.
example: I missed the bus. / バスが乗り過ぎてしまった。
I need to replace my old monica with a new one. / 私の古いモニターを新しいものに交換したいです。

definition_en: A terrifying and dangerous creature.
example: The monster was hiding in the closet. / クローゼットに怪物が隠れていた。

definition_en: To have an absolute requirement for.
example: I needed a map to find my way. / マップがなくて迷ったので必要にあった。

definition_en: To remark upon; to mention.
meanings_ja:
I'm a Japanese-English dictionary! 😊

**Notice**: I'll provide the most common meanings of "noticed" with concise translations.

**Meaning 1:** 感知した
**Meaning 2:** 寝入識別 (in a context where something is recognized or identified)

**Example:** 
English: She noticed that he was staring at her.
Japanese: 彼は彼女を観察し始めた。

definition_en: No particular place, noplace.
example: I couldn't find my keys anywhere, it seemed nowhere. / 私の鍵はどこにも見つからないように、どこにもないようだった。

definition_en: A proposal that has been made.
meanings_ja: 提供 (in a business sense, e.g. a product or service offer)
example: I'm waiting for an offer on my old car. / 私は古い車のオファーを待っています。

definition_en: An ache or bodily suffering, or an instance of this; an unpleasant sensation, resulting from a derangement of functions, disease, or injury by violence; hurt.
example: I've been feeling a sharp pain in my knee. / わたしは、もろみんがけんに激しい疼痛を感じています。

definition_en: (grammar) The perfect tense, or a form in that tense.
example: The new smartphone is perfect for my needs. / 私のニーズに最適な新しいスマートフォンです。

definition_en: An uncertainty.
example: I'll go to the store, perhaps. / 私は店に行くかもしれない。

definition_en: To grasp and pull with the fingers or fingernails.
example: I picked a book from the shelf. / 街道から一冊の本を選んだ。

definition_en: To claim, to allege, especially when falsely or as a form of deliberate deception.
example: I'm going to pretend to be a superhero tonight! / 今夜はスーパーヒーローになります！

definition_en: To pay (a debt, fine etc.).
example: I'm going to quit my job and travel around the world. / 私は世界一周旅行に行くために仕事を辞めます。

definition_en: About, regarding, with reference to; especially in letters, documents and emails.
example: I'm going to re-write my essay. / 私はエッセイを書き直します。

definition_en: The act of stretching or extending; extension.
example: The company wants to reach more customers. / その会社はさらに多くの顧客を手にすることを目指す。

definition_en: (physical) A solid object in the shape of a circle.
meanings_ja: 音楽的循環 (referring to musical rings or cycles)
example: The wedding ring was a symbol of their love. / 婚約指輪は彼らの愛のシンボルでした。

definition_en: The act or result of rolling, or state of being rolled.
meanings_ja: ころぶ、転がる (to roll around)
example: The dog likes to roll in the grass. / 犬は芝生でころぶことが好きです。

definition_en: The unmowed part of a golf course.
example: The road was rough, but we made it to the top. / 道はへりくじったけど、頂きに達した。

definition_en: A regulation, law, guideline.
example: The company has a strict rule against smoking in the office. / 会社はオフィスでの喫煙を厳しく規制しています。

definition_en: To pronounce.
example: "The saying 'honesty is the best policy' is true." / 「正直は一番の政策」という言葉は本当です。

definition_en: Each of the four divisions of a year: spring, summer, autumn (fall) and winter
example: The new season of my favorite TV show has started. / 新しいTV番組の新しいシーズンが始まりました。

definition_en: Something that is number two in a series.
meanings_ja: 小さい部分（例えば、分の秒）
example: It took me seconds to realize my mistake. / 私は一瞬で自分の間違いを悟った。

definition_en: Without humor or expression of happiness; grave in manner or disposition
example: I have to take this seriously. / 私にはこのことは非常に重い。

definition_en: (manner) In a serious or literal manner.
example: I'm seriously injured. / 私は深刻な傷害を受けました。

definition_en: An act of putting the ball or shuttlecock in play in various games.
example: I will serve you a cup of coffee. / コーヒーカップをあなたに提供します。

definition_en: A brief fall of precipitation (spell of rain, or a similar fall of snow, sleet, or cascade).
example: I'm going to take a shower after my workout. / ジャジガー後はバスルームでシャワーを浴びます。

definition_en: Closed, shut.
meanings_ja: 非常に小さくする (in a figurative sense)
example: I need to shut this window because it's cold. / 私のために窓を閉じなければ寒いです。

definition_en: A 45 RPM vinyl record with one song on side A and one on side B.
example: I'm looking for a single room at the hotel. / ホテルで一人部屋を探しています。

definition_en: The outer protective layer of the body of any animal, including of a human.
example: The doctor examined her skin to diagnose the rash. / ドクターは彼女の皮膚を診て、疱瘡を診断しました。

definition_en: Former, erstwhile; at some previous time.
example: I'll meet you sometime. / 私はある時期に会う。

definition_en: A polygon with four sides of equal length and four right angles; an equilateral rectangle; a regular quadrilateral.
example: The new development will include a large square in the city center. / 市中心に大きな公共の場所を含む新しい開発計画があります。

definition_en: (heading) To position or be positioned physically.
example: I'm standing in line for a new iPhone. / 新しいiPhoneのための列に立っています。

definition_en: A condition; a set of circumstances applying at any given time.
example: The state of emergency has been declared. / emergancyの状況が宣言された。

definition_en: The act of stealing.
example: He stole my lunch from the cafeteria. / 彼は校庭の食堂から私のランチを盗んだ。

definition_en: Something that is not crooked or bent such as a part of a road or track.
example: The road was straight and smooth. / 道は正しい状態で滑らかでした。

definition_en: Practiced; self-conscious; careful.
example: I studied mathematics. / 私は数学を学んだ。

definition_en: A stupid person; a fool.
example: He's stupid to invest in that company. / 彼はその会社に投資する愚かしいです。

definition_en: Something unexpected.
example: I got a surprise gift from my friend. / 友人から不意の贈り物を受けました。

definition_en: A Japanese dish made of small portions of sticky white rice flavored with vinegar, usually wrapped in seaweed and filled or topped with fish, vegetables or meat.
example: I love eating sushi at the restaurant.

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 取りつかえる (in psychology, e.g., "taking someone's advice")
example: I'm taking a break to relax. / 私はリラックスするため休憩を取ります。

definition_en: Despite that; however.
example: I'm tired, though I had a good sleep. / 私は疲れおり、しかし私は良い寝てある。

definition_en: To change place.
meanings_ja: きれいに投げた (to throw something away neatly)
example: He threw the ball to his friend. / 彼は友人にボールを投げた。

definition_en: A cloth used for wiping, especially one used for drying anything wet, as a person after a bath.
meanings_ja: バスターシャワーツウール（温浴や入浴の際に使用するもの）
example: I packed a few towels in my bag. / バッグの中にいくつかの掃き布を詰めました。

definition_en: To attempt; to endeavour. Followed by infinitive.
example: I'm trying to learn Japanese. / 私は日本語を学んでいます。

definition_en: (heading) to make a non-linear physical movement.
example: The company turned down our proposal. / 会社は我们的提案を却下した。

definition_en: An occurrence of the interjection "uh".
example: "Uh, can you repeat that?" / 「ううん、もう一度お願いします」

definition_en: Up to the time of (something happening).
example: I'll stay here until you come back. / 君が戻ってくるまではここに留まる。

definition_en: To utilize or employ.
meanings_ja: 使用する (for instance, using a tool or software)
example: I'm using my new smartphone. / 私は新しいスマートフォンを使っています。

definition_en: Something complete, without any parts missing.
example: The company wanted to make sure that the whole project was successful. / その会社は、全プロジェクトが成功することを確保したいと考えていました。

definition_en: One who has won or often wins.
example: The winner of the competition was announced yesterday. / 昨日、競技会の優勝者が発表された。

definition_en: To conquer, defeat.
meanings_ja: 勝ち取る (in a competition or game)
example: The team wins the championship. / チームはチャンピオンシップを優勝した。

definition_en: Value.
meanings_ja: やむを得ない (in this case, it means something is necessary or deserves to be done)
example: The new policy is worth considering. / 新しい政策は検討に値する。

definition_en: To sort or arrange according to characteristic or class.
meanings_ja: varied ことのまとまったもの
複数の品種や種類のあるもの (e.g. assorted fruits)
example: I bought an assorted box of cookies. / COOKIEは、複数の味がある箱で購入しました。

definition_en: Case; instance; circumstance; event; incident; accident.
example: The storm will befall us on our hike. / 我々のハイキングで嵐が襲う。

definition_en: To assign a category; to divide into classes.
example: The company categorizes its products by type. / 会社は製品を型別に分類する。

definition_en: Overly confident; arrogant and boastful.
example: He's too cocky, always boasting about his accomplishments. / 彼は高慢すぎて、常に自分の成功を誇張している。

definition_en: A tactic used to draw attention away from the real threat or action.
meanings_ja: 分岐（例えば道路や鉄道の分岐）
example: The theme park was a great diversion from the stress of work. / ワークのストレスから解放された Thema Parkはすばらしかった。

definition_en: Treating all parties, rivals, or disputants equally; not partial; not biased
example: The judge tried to remain impartial in her decision. / 求判官は自分の判断で中立を保とうと尽力した。

definition_en: A game of chance, in which a small ball is made to move round rapidly on a circle divided off into numbered red and black spaces, the one on which it stops indicating the result of a variety of wagers permitted by the game.
meanings_ja: ドール (a small ball or sphere, often used in games like roulette)
遊戲のWheel (the wheel used in games of chance)
example: The casino is famous for its roulettes and slots. / カジノはドールやスロットゲームで有名です。

definition_en: A scruple or objection.
meanings_ja: 数字を暗記する (in this sense, "boggle" refers to a type of memory game or puzzle)
example: I love to play boggle with my friends. / 私たちは友達とびっくりゲームを遊びます。

definition_en: To bite or chew loudly or heavily.
example: He's always picking up chumps at the bar. / 彼は常にバーで愚かな者と付き合っている。

definition_en: The area where something forks or branches, a ramification takes place.
example: The pants were too tight around my crotch. / パンツは腰周りがあまりに狭かった。
The chef carefully chopped the crudetes for the salad. / 料亭のシェフはサラダのために野菜の切れ物を細かにカットした。

definition_en: A person with poor judgment and taste.
meanings_ja: クイズの答案の間違い
example: He's such a doofus for not knowing that answer. / 彼はその問題の答えを知らないという愚かなことをしてしまう。

definition_en: Someone who is feeble-minded; an idiot.
example: The detective gathered feebs from witnesses to crack the case. / 検察官は目撃者のfeebsを集めて事件の解決に役立った。
The CEO appointed me as the liaison between departments. /  CEOは、私たち部門との連絡を任せてください。

definition_en: The planned movement of troops, vehicles etc.; a strategic repositioning; (later also) a large training field-exercise of fighting units.
example: The pilot had to maneuver the plane to avoid turbulence. / パイロットは乱気を避けるために機体を操作した。

definition_en: An act of putting a person in a headlock and rubbing one's knuckles on the other person's head, often a playful gesture of affection when done lightly.
example: I got a bunch of noogies from my friend, and we played with them. / 私は友達からたくさんの乗り物の玩具をもらい、遊んだ。

meanings_ja: アフリカ大動物圏（サセレーニー）
example: The Serengeti is home to many wild animals. / サセレーニーには多くの野生動物が棲む。

meanings_ja: 接着接合 (in a chemical sense)
example: The new bonding technology uses transbonding to connect dissimilar materials. / 新しい接着技術は、異なる材料を接着接合するためにトランスボンディングを使用します。

definition_en: A type of sushi made from freshwater eel.
meanings_ja: 繰り下がる、延びる（to delay, to prolong）
example: I'm looking forward to trying grilled unagi at the restaurant. / うなぎのグリルを食べたいと思っています。

meanings_ja: 文書類の総称 (複数の文書を指す)
example: The woolery industry is thriving in this region. / この地域では羊毛の産業が好調です。
